warezcdn.name: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni Gou
warezcdn.title: Higurashi: When They Cry - GOU

imdb.title: Higurashi: When They Cry - GOU
imdb.plot: Keiichi Maebara is in his new home in the peaceful Hinamizawa village, making friends with girls from school. He's here for a big festival. But something about this town seems off, with that fear what dark secrets can this small t...

episodes.title: Demon-Deceiving Chapter, Part 1
episodes.plot: Keiichi spends his day accompanying his friends. He, Mion and Rena are on a tour to the village. Afterwards, he retrieves the statue of a fast food restaurant mascot because Rena finds it 'cute'.

episodes.title: Demon-Deceiving Chapter, Part 2
episodes.plot: Keiichi goes with Rena to retrieve the Colonel so she can take him home with her. Later, Keiichi and his friends have fun at the festival and watch Rika performing the ritual.

episodes.title: Demon-Deceiving Chapter, Part 3
episodes.plot: Hinamizawa's darkest secrets begin to unfold as Keiichi talks with the local detective.

episodes.title: Demon-Deceiving Chapter, Part 4
episodes.plot: Keiichi grows more suspicious of Rena. The next day at school, Rika encourages Keiichi to be brave. Keiichi feels guilty and tries to return to normal life. That same evening, his parents leave town for the night, leaving him alone, and Rena wants to come over to cook dinner for him.

episodes.title: Cotton-Deceiving Chapter, Part 1
episodes.plot: Keiichi and his friends attend a game competition at a Sonozaki family owned shop. As a consolation prize for the event money, the store owner gives dolls to everyone except Mion. Keiichi gives his to Mion as he sees no value in keeping it. Later, Keiichi and his father meet at the cosplay restaurant. There, Keiichi meets Shion and confuses her for Mion, due to similar appearances. She proclaims that she is actually Mion's twin sister. Keiichi believes she is Mion pretending to be effeminate.

episodes.title: Cotton-Deceiving Chapter, Part 2
episodes.plot: Keiichi learns about the yearly murders from Shion, Miyo, and Jiro. At the festival, Shion drags Keiichi away from Rika's dance and the two run into Miyo and Jiro, who are breaking into the ritual tool shed. They decide to go inside to look at it with Miyo.

episodes.title: Cotton-Deceiving Chapter, Part 3
episodes.plot: Inside the sacred shed Keiichi learns about the dark origins of the Hinamizawa village and the Festival. The day after he finds out that Miyo, Jiro, and the village mayor have gone missing.

episodes.title: Cotton-Deceiving Chapter, Part 4
episodes.plot: Rika has suddenly gone missing and Satoko coldly suspects Keiichi, who was the last one to talk with Rika, but Mion says that she saw Rika speaking with some men in construction uniforms. While looking for Rika, Mion pulls Keiichi away from a locked silo and indirectly informs Keiichi that Rika is trying to kill people and that she needs to put an end to string of murders occurring, which is being led by the Three Great Families.

episodes.title: Tataridamashi-hen: Curse-Deceiving Chapter, Part 1
episodes.plot: Keiichi makes a bet to the club that he can cook better than Satoko. The same night, he attempts to fry some vegetables but nearly burns down his own house. Rika and Satoko arrive to put out the fire and Satoko prepares her own dish. Rika explains to Keiichi that Satoko is taking a liking to cooking for him since it reminds her of when her older brother, Satoshi, used to wait for her meals.

episodes.title: Tataridamashi-hen: Curse-Deceiving Chapter, Part 2
episodes.plot: After arriving at school, Keiichi and Rena notice that Satoko and Rika are not there. Keiichi assumes that Satoko has a fever. Soon after, Rika enters the class. Keiichi asks where Satoko is, and Rika says that Satoko will be late. During PE class, someone Oishi comes after Keiichi. He wants Keiichi to call Satoko but he keeps refusing. He then asks another student to call Satoko, which is not possible because Satoko is absent. Oishi then tells Keiichi that in place like Hinamizawa, it's better for him to not make enemies. Irie then stops Oishi, and he leaves. Irie ...

episodes.title: Satokowashi-hen: Village-Destroying Chapter, Part 6
episodes.plot: Satoko finds out that some non-looping people retain a fragment of memory from the loops she lived through. One of those people is her uncle Teppei.

episodes.title: Satokowashi-hen: Village-Destroying Chapter, Part 7
episodes.plot: Satoko tries again by using Miyo, who now also retains memories from previous loops.
